name: Torterra
flavorText:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather
on its unmoving back to begin
building their nests.

previous.name: Grotle
previous.flavorText:
It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

next.name: Chimchar
next.flavorText:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

pokemon.name: Turtwig
pokemon.flavorText:
Made from soil, the shell on its
back hardens when it drinks water.
It lives along lakes.

up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.
